Label.en: Do you enjoy reclining on couches and drinking wine until the early hours of the morning with your friends?

Label.en: Well, you would have fit in well in Attic Greece in the 5th Century BC

Label.en: This pot was for just such an occasion!
Label.fr: This pot was for just such an occasion!
Label.es: This pot was for just such an occasion!

Label.en: Strong wine was mixed with water inside, and servants would draw from it at the request of the party-goers
Label.fr: Strong wine was mixed with water inside, and servants would draw from it at the request of the party-goers
Label.es: Strong wine was mixed with water inside, and servants would draw from it at the request of the party-goers

Label.en: The painting on it shows scenes from the Trojan war!

Label.es: The painting on it shows scenes from the Trojan war!

Label.en: The idea is that this krater would sit in the middle of the room, and the paintings would spark conversation about the myths depicted!

Label.en: This particular painter is famous for exactly that - leaving lots of space...
Label.fr: This particular painter is famous for exactly that - leaving lots of space...
Label.es: This particular painter is famous for exactly that - leaving lots of space...

Label.en: By painting less, he asks the viewer to appreciate what he HAS drawn more closely!
Label.fr: By painting less, he asks the viewer to appreciate what he HAS drawn more closely!
Label.es: By painting less, he asks the viewer to appreciate what he HAS drawn more closely!

Label.en: In this case... two scenes of the famous hero Achilles fighting heroes in the Trojan army - Hector and Memnon
Label.fr: In this case... two scenes of the famous hero Achilles fighting heroes in the Trojan army - Hector and Memnon
Label.es: In this case... two scenes of the famous hero Achilles fighting heroes in the Trojan army - Hector and Memnon

Label.en: Some painters show these scenes as triumphant moments... but this guy chooses to highlight the sadness of the event, too
Label.fr: Some painters show these scenes as triumphant moments... but this guy chooses to highlight the sadness of the event, too
Label.es: Some painters show these scenes as triumphant moments... but this guy chooses to highlight the sadness of the event, too

Label.en: Well, it's partly due to how hopeless Hector is here...
Label.fr: Well, it's partly due to how hopeless Hector is here...
Label.es: Well, it's partly due to how hopeless Hector is here...

Label.en: While Achilles is in a powerful pose, Hector is falling over, injured
Label.fr: While Achilles is in a powerful pose, Hector is falling over, injured
Label.es: While Achilles is in a powerful pose, Hector is falling over, injured

Label.en: And his guardian god, Apollo, is leaving him...
Label.fr: And his guardian god, Apollo, is leaving him...
Label.es: And his guardian god, Apollo, is leaving him...

Label.en: He makes it sad to try and get the party-goers talking and debating (Greeks LOVED debating, especially when drunk)
Label.fr: He makes it sad to try and get the party-goers talking and debating (Greeks LOVED debating, especially when drunk)
Label.es: He makes it sad to try and get the party-goers talking and debating (Greeks LOVED debating, especially when drunk)
